chokepoints.name: Strait of Hormuz
chokepoints.note: Iranian naval posturing during Geneva talks. IRGCN fast boats active.

chokepoints.name: Bab el-Mandeb
chokepoints.note: Houthi drone/missile attacks ongoing. US Navy coalition patrols active. Commercial vessels avoiding.

chokepoints.name: Taiwan Strait
chokepoints.note: PLA Fujian carrier drills. US FON transits ongoing. Monitor for JOINT SWORD trigger.

chokepoints.name: Suez Canal
chokepoints.note: Operating normally. Reduced throughput as vessels reroute from Red Sea via Cape of Good Hope.

chokepoints.name: GIUK Gap
chokepoints.note: Russian submarine transit monitoring. NATO P-8 Poseidon patrols active.

chokepoints.name: Malacca Strait
chokepoints.note: Normal commercial traffic. Routine piracy monitoring.

conflicts.name: Ukraine-Russia War
conflicts.update: Zelenskyy-Trump call Feb 25 re: peace talks. US-Ukraine envoys meeting Geneva Feb 26. Russia recruiting 1,700+ African mercenaries. Frontlines static in Donbas.

conflicts.name: Gaza Conflict
conflicts.update: Modi addressed Israeli Knesset Feb 25. Hostage negotiations ongoing. IDF operations continuing in Gaza.

conflicts.name: Red Sea / Houthi Campaign
conflicts.update: Houthi drone/missile attacks on shipping ongoing. Nimitz CSG in North Arabian Sea. Commercial vessels rerouting via Cape of Good Hope.

conflicts.name: Israel-Lebanon Border
conflicts.update: Ceasefire largely holding since Nov 2024. IDF buffer zone in southern Lebanon maintained. Sporadic incidents only.

conflicts.name: Syria â€” Post-Assad Transition
conflicts.update: HTS-led government consolidating control post-Assad fall. ISIS remnants active in east Syria. Turkey, US, Israel all maintaining presence.

conflicts.name: Taiwan Strait Tensions
conflicts.update: PLA Fujian carrier conducting drills near strait. Philippines People Power 40th anniversary protests. US FON transits maintained.

conflicts.name: South China Sea Disputes
conflicts.update: PLA activity elevated near Spratlys. Philippines-China standoffs at Second Thomas Shoal continuing. Marcos Jr under pressure domestically.

conflicts.name: Iran-Israel / US-Iran Tensions
conflicts.update: US-Iran nuclear talks in Geneva Feb 26 â€” Trump weighing options post-SOTU. Ford CSG in Eastern Med as deterrent. Next round could be decisive.

exercises.name: COBRA GOLD 2026
exercises.participants: US, Thailand, Japan, Singapore, Indonesia, Malaysia, South Korea
exercises.notes: Largest multilateral exercise in Indo-Pacific. Currently active.

exercises.name: DEFENDER EUROPE 2026
exercises.notes: Annual large-scale NATO ground exercise. Planning underway.

exercises.name: STEADFAST DEFENDER 2026
exercises.notes: NATO's largest defensive exercise. Focus on eastern flank.

exercises.name: VOSTOK 2026 (Russia)
exercises.notes: Annual Russian strategic exercise. China participation expected.

exercises.name: JOINT SWORD (China)
exercises.notes: Unannounced China exercises triggered by Taiwan events. Monitor for JOINT SWORD triggers.

exercises.name: RED FLAG 26-2
exercises.notes: RED FLAG 26-1 completed Jan 2026. 26-2 planned for spring.

gps_zones.name: Eastern Ukraine / Donbas
gps_zones.notes: Active Russian GPS jamming and spoofing. Ongoing since 2022.

gps_zones.name: Northern Finland / Lapland
gps_zones.notes: Russian jamming from Kola Peninsula. Affecting Finnish/Norwegian airspace.

gps_zones.name: Baltic States
gps_zones.notes: Intermittent Russian jamming. NATO monitoring closely.

gps_zones.name: Black Sea / Romania
gps_zones.notes: Spoofing incidents ongoing. Vessels reporting false positions.

gps_zones.name: Israel / Eastern Med
gps_zones.notes: Active IDF jamming over Israel and Lebanon. Ongoing since Oct 2023.

gps_zones.name: Syria / Iraq Border
gps_zones.notes: Multi-source jamming â€” US, Russian, Turkish forces all operating systems.

gps_zones.name: Red Sea / Yemen
gps_zones.notes: Houthi spoofing affecting commercial shipping navigation.

gps_zones.name: Taiwan Strait
gps_zones.notes: PLA jamming exercises. Intermittent disruption to civil aviation.

gps_zones.name: South China Sea â€” Spratlys
gps_zones.notes: Chinese jamming around artificial islands. Philippine vessels reporting.

gps_zones.name: Kaliningrad
gps_zones.notes: Russian exclave jamming. Affecting NE Poland and Lithuania airspace.

gps_zones.name: Persian Gulf / Hormuz
gps_zones.notes: Reduced since nuclear talks began but not eliminated. Monitor.

notams.name: Israel / Gaza TFR
notams.notes: TFR active over Gaza. Ben Gurion operational with restrictions.

notams.name: Red Sea NOTAM
notams.notes: UKMTO/US Navy warnings. Commercial vessels avoiding core lanes.

notams.name: Lebanon Restrictions
notams.notes: Beirut airport operational. South Lebanon restricted.

notams.name: Iran ADIZ Alert
notams.notes: Heightened air defense during Geneva talks. Monitor for changes.

notams.name: Taiwan Strait Notice
notams.notes: PLA activity. Airlines rerouting. Monitor for JOINT SWORD trigger.

notams.name: Baltic Air Policing
notams.notes: NATO Enhanced Air Policing active. Russian intercepts ongoing.

notams.name: North Korea Exclusion Zone
notams.notes: DPRK airspace fully restricted. ICAO warnings active.

notams.name: Sudan Airspace NOTAM
notams.notes: RSF-SAF civil war ongoing. Khartoum area dangerous.

notams.name: Myanmar Conflict Zone
notams.notes: Civil war continuing. Military junta vs resistance forces. Airspace hazardous.
